</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Background:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Aguila Project currently comprises 17 mining concessions aggregating 30,074 hectares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as described in the table above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The early history of activity at the Aguila Project, as known by us, included prospecting and limited mining for gold and silver from the early 1900&#x2019;s to the mid 1960&#x2019;s. In 1998, the concessions were leased to Apex Silver Mines
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage20"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Corporation of Denver, Colorado. Apex carried out an exploration program involving geologic mapping, surface sampling and an 11-hole drilling program (1,242 meters). The results did not meet Apex&#x2019;s expectations so it cancelled its lease on the property in 2002.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2002, we leased the Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, El Aire and La Tehuana concessions from a third party. The Aguila and El Aire concessions are part of the Aguila Project and the La Tehuana concession comprises the Margaritas property. The Aguila lease agreement is subject to a 4% net smelter return royalty where
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	production is sold in the form of gold/silver dor&#xE9; and 5% for production sold in concentrate form. Subject to meeting minimum exploration requirements, there is no expiration term for the lease. We may terminate it at any time upon written notice to the lessor and the lessor may terminate it if we fail to fulfill any of our obligations, which primarily consist of paying the appropriate royalty to the lessor.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In August 2003, we commenced an initial drilling and exploration program at the Aguila Project. Through 2015, we have drilled a total of 814 core holes (both surface and underground) equaling 245,738 meters and 166 reverse circulation holes equaling 14,367 meters for a total of 980 holes totaling 260,105 meters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2010, we acquired
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from a third
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, at no additional cost, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	El Chacal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	El Pilon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	concessions, which are subject to a 2% royalty, but are not subject to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We filed for and received
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional concessions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from the Mexican government which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are also not part of the concessions leased or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	acquired from the third party.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The mineral concessions making up the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project are located within the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	San Pedro
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Totolapam and San Pedro Quiatoni Ejidos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Location and Access
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project is located in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Sierra Madre del Sur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mountains of southern Mexico in the centr
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	al part of the State of Oaxaca.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The property is located along a major paved highway approximately 120 kilometers southeast of Oaxaca
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	City, the state&#x2019;s capital city.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The property is approximately four kilometers due northwest from the village of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	San Jose de Gracia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	have constructed gravel and paved roads from the village to the mine and mill sites which supports adequate access to the property.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The climate of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project area is dry and warm to very warm with most rainfall occurring in the summer and annual precipitation averaging 423.7 mm. The average yearly temperature is 26.6 degrees centigrade. The area is very rocky with arid vegetation. Subsistence farming occurs and the main agricultural crop is agave cactus that is cultivated for the production of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	mescal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Geology and Mineralization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project is located in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	San Jose de Gracia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	District in Oaxaca. Multiple volcanic domes of various scales, and probably non-vented intrusive domes, dominate the district geology. These volcanogenic features are imposed on a pre-volcanic basement of sedimentary rocks. Gold and silver mineralization in this district is related to the manifestations of this classic volcanogenic system and is considered epithermal in character.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Historically, we have produced ore from two locations on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	open pit mine and the underground mine at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Arista
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vein system. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	open pit mineralization is considered low sulfidation, epithermal mineralization
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of gold with some silver and no base metals. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Arista
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vein system is considered intermediate epithermal mineralization of gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc. The host rock at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Arista
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vein system is primarily andesite.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Facilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We constructed a mill facility and infrastructure at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project for approximately $35 million in 2009, and expanded the mill facility in 2012 and 2013, spending an additional $23 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The flotation mill expansion, completed at the end of 2013, increased the number of flotation cells
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	added a second ball mill to allow for additional processing capacity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and a Knelson gravity con
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	centrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2014 we completed a dor&#xE9; processing facility.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	mill is flexible in its ability to process s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	everal types of mineralization.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	It has a differential flotation section capable of processing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	polymetallic mineralized material and producing up to three separate concentrate products for sale. The mill also has an agitated leach circuit capable of producing gold and silver dor&#xE9; for sale. Depending on the specific type and characteristics of the mineralized material, the mill can process sulfide material in its flotation circuit at a nominal 1,500 tonnes of mineralized material per day. The agitated leach circuit can process a nominal 300 tonnes per day.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage21"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Power is provided by diesel generators at the site.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We obtained water rights from the Mexican government for an amount of water that we believe is sufficient to meet our operating requirements and pump it approximately five kilometers to the site from a permitted well located near the Totolapam River.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Additional improvements at the site include a second diesel generation power p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lant and switch gear, paving a three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	kilometer section of the road from the mine to the mill, construction of a new surface maintenance garage and fuel station, haul roads from the mine site to the mill, mill facility office space, an assay lab, an exploration office, a tailings impoundment facility and other infrastructure.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During 2015 a third phase tailings facility was constructed with an estimated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and a half
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	holding capacit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	y, depending on mill throughput.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A phase four tailings facility has been engineered and is planned for construction during 2017
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Exploration Activities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Exploration at the Aguila Project during 2015 primarily focused on the Arista mine&#x2019;s Arista and Switchback vein systems. Currently more than 20 veins have been identif
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ied at the Arista vein system.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The new Viridiana vein was discovered during 2015 along with indications of additional veins. The relatively new Switchback vein system has at least 7 veins with indications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of additional veins as well.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Drilling the Arista vein system has shown mineralized material over 1,000 meters of strike length and more than 500 meters of depth with certain veins open along strike and depth.&nbsp;&nbsp;Drilling the Switchback vein system has shown mineralized material 450 meters on strike and 450 meters depth with certain veins open on strike and depth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the year we focused primarily on infill and step-out drilling to further define the Arista
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ine&#x2019;s mineralization and to assist in mine planning. In addition to targeting the vein systems at the Arista underground mine, surface exploration drilling was conducted on the Aguila Project targeting the potential feeder veins of the Aguila open pit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and Santiago veins and the Escondida and Salina Blanca prospects located northwest and southwest of the Arista mine, respectively. We completed an additional 93 diamond drill holes (both surface and underground) totaling 29,363 meters. Economically significant gold, silver and base metal values
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Escondida
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and Salina Blanca
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were encountered and further drilling is planned in 2016. The results from these activities have also generated additional exploration targets that are marked for future drilling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During 2015, we drifted approximately 450
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	meters from our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Arista vein system towards the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Switchback vein system located approximatel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	y 500 meters to the northeast.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In order to test for potential water flows in the Switchback veins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and prepare for water management
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	we stopped the drift approximately 50 meters from the veins and set up a third drill station
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from which we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	tes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ted for water
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The ini
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	tial holes did not encounter an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	appreciable amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	water
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	although we do expect to encounter water courses in the future as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	we develop the Switchback vein system. From the new drill station, we c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ontinued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	exploration with infill and step-out holes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	intercepted high-grade polymetallic gold, silver, copper, lead and zinc mineralization in multiple en echelon veins. 2015 drill highlights included a 15.22 meters wide zone averaging 3.18 g/t gold, 292 g/t silver, 0.87% copper, 1.56% lead and 4.26% zinc which included 1.15 meters grading 12.65 g/t gold, 822 g/t silver, 0.75% copper, 0.93% lead and 1.59% zinc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	evelopment plans in 2016 include the completion of a second drift from the Arista vein system to the Switchback vein system, which will be located approximately seven levels (140 meters) below the first drift driven to Switchback in 2015 from the fourteen level. Construction of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	second drift to Switchback began in January 2016 with a goal to complete it during the third quarter of 2016, which will be dependent on drift progression, rock competency, and potential water courses that may be encountered during development. Once the second drift reaches Switchback, multiple levels are planned for development between these two drifts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	followed by preparation of ore blocks for future bulk tonnage mining.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The 2016 exploration program&#x2019;s primary goal is to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	continue expanding the Arista m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ine&#x2019;s mineralization at both the Arista and Switchback vein systems. As we continue to drill and expand Switchback along both strike and depth, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	look forward to planned Switchback mine development advancing to a point
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	where
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	we can touch
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the mineralized veins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage22"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and potentially convert Switchback mineralized material into proven and probable reserves for 2017.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Please see
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item 7. Management&#x2019;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for information concerning our mining operations at the Aguila Project.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC407547176">
</A>
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC408152811">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Exploration Properties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Margaritas Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Margaritas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property is made up of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	La
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Tehuana
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	concession. We leased this concession
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from a third party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in October 2002 along with two of the concessions comprising the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	he terms of this agreement are discussed under &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Project
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; above. It is comprised of approximately 925 hectares located
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	along our 55 kilometer mineralized trend and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	adjacent to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:22.3PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	At the Margaritas property, w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e drilled 23 holes totaling 10,409 meters
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in 2015; t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	o-date, we have drilled 47 core holes for a total of 18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,444 meters.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	High-grade drill results in 2015 were mainly on the Tapada Vein which included 2.15 meters grading 1.15 g/t gold and 599 g/t silver, 0.68 meters grading 1.65 g/t gold and 1,260 g/t silver and 0.30 meters grading 7.05
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	g/t gold and 4,010 g/t silver.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2015, a soil and rock geochemical program also continued a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	t the Margaritas property. This program expanded upon the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	geochemical program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	began in 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Soil and rock samples were collected on lines oriented from southwest to northeast across the projection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of known regional structures.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The soil data showed a series of west-northwest and northwest trending trends visible in the epithermal pathfinder suite of metals (gold, silver, arsenic, antimony, mercury and th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	allium).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	These linear patterns spatially correlate with known historical mining i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n the Margaritas district.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The linear patterns also extend beyond and between the known workings and establish additional trends for prospecting along mapped structural
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	orientations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Geological mapping and geochemical sampling identified a new gold and silver mineralized zone called &#x201C;Trenes&#x201D; at Margaritas with rock chip samples returning values up to 1.0 meter of 2.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7 g/t gold and 240 g/t silver.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	An initial surface diamond drilling program is being planned for Trenes in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:22.3PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:22.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Alta Gracia Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:22.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In August 2009, we acquired claims adjacent to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Margaritas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Alta Gracia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mining District by filing concessions known as the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	David 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	David 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	La
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Herradura
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	totaling 5,175 hectares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Additional follow-up surface drilling was conducted at Alta Gracia during 2015 with 9 diamond drill holes to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	taling 2,554 meters completed; to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	date, we have drilled 97 core holes for a total of 21,675 meters
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The 2015 drill campaign continued to focus on the Mirador vein near the his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	toric Mirador underground mine.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	High-grade intercepts on the Mirador vein included 4.01 meters averaging 2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	52 g/t gold and 595 g/t silver.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A second Mirador vein intercept in the hanging wall returned 2.12 meters grading 1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4 g/t gold and 493 g/t silver.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Mirador vein gold and silver mineralization discovered to date still does not show any appreciable base metals, so this precious metal mineralization can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	potentially be trucked to and processed through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the agitated leach circuit at our mill located at our Aguila Project.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2015, mineable resources were estimated and metallurgical test work completed with mining and processing of Alta Gracia mineralized material contemplated at our Aguila processing facility in 2016.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Follow-up drilling is also being planned for Alta Gracia in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:22.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:22.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In June 2011, we staked mineral claims between the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Alta Gracia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	along
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	trend
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and acquired an exploration concession from the Mexican government of approximately 26,386 hectares referred to as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In March 2013, we acquired a property known as Cerro Colorado (comprised of the San Pedro Fracc. 2 concession) from Almaden Minerals, Ltd. consisting of approximately 1,860 hectares. The Cerro Colorado property is surrounded by our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	concession and we include it as part of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property. Any future production from the Cerro Colorado concession is subject to a 2% net smelter return royalty in favor of Almaden.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Because of the close proximity of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to Alta Gracia, exploration activity began on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	this property during late 2011
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and to date has been limited to geochemical sampling and drilling of eight shallow core holes for a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,327 meters.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	No significant work was conducted at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during 2015. In 2016, surface geological mapping and geochemical sampling of several new prospective targets identified on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property is expected to continue.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Fuego
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In March 2013, we acquired the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Fuego
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property (comprised of the San Pedro Fracc. 1 concession) from Almaden Minerals Ltd. subject to a 2% net smelter return royalty. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Fuego
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property consists of approximately 2,554 hectares and is located south of our Alta Gracia and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Chamizo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	properties. In 2013,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Fuego
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was included in the property-wide airborne geophysical survey. Geologic mapping and surface sampling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	were conducted on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Fuego
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	property during 2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	allow us to meet the acceptable minimum amount of work required to maintain the claims.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We plan to conduct further geologic mapping and sampling in 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property consists of concessions on the far northwest end of our 55 kilometer mineralized corridor in the State of Oaxaca known as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	El Virrey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	La Reyna
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	El Marquez
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We acquired the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	concession from a third party and it is subject to a 2% net smelter return royalty payable to them on a portion of the claims. We obtained the remaining concessions by staking claims and filing for concessions with the Mexican government.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	located
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximately 64.4 kilometers by road from the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project.&nbsp;There is no plant or equipment on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	If exploration is successful, any mining would probably require an underground mine where mineralized material could be trucked to the Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	mill located on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Aguila Project for processing. Limited drilling at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	has encountered gold and silver mineralization up to one meter of 132.5 g/t gold and 1.5 meters of 958 g/t silver.&nbsp;The mineralized material has been located within 100 meters from the surface. To date, we have drilled 48
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	core holes for a total of 5,273
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	meters at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property. Early in 2012, we completed a small amount of work to finish refurbishing and extending an existing shaft on the property to permit underground exploratory drilling. We ceased work at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during 2012, following a request to obtain additional approvals from local community agencies. We continue to work with the local agencies and anticipate resolving the matter, but we have no assurance that we will be able to resume our exploration activities in the near term. If the matter is resolved, we will conduct follow-up drilling and exploration based on the drilling done in 2008. We do not anticipate any significant exploration activities at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rey in 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. However, we plan to conduct the acceptable minimum amount of work required to maintain the claims.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC407547177">
</A>
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC408152812">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mining Concessions and Regulations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	in Mexico
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mineral rights in Mexico belong to the Mexican federal government and are administered pursuant to Article 27 of the Mexican Constitution. All of our mining concessions are exploitation concessions, which may be granted or transferred to Mexican citizens and corporations. Our leases or concessions are held by our Mexican subsidiary. Exploitation concessions have a term of 50 years and can be renewed for another 50 years. Concessions grant us the right to explore and exploit all minerals found in the ground. Maintenance of concessions requires the semi-annual payment of mining duties (due in January and July) and the performance of assessment work, on a calendar year basis, with assessment work reports required to be filed in the month of May for the preceding calendar year. The amount of mining duties and annual assessment are set by regulation, may increase over the life of the concession and include periodic adjustments for inflation. Mining concessions are registered at the Public Registry of Mining in Mexico City and in regional offices in Mexico.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mexican mining law does not require payment of finder&#x2019;s fees to the government, except for a discovery premium in connection with national mineral reserves, concessions and claims or allotments contracted directly from the Mexican Geological Survey. None of the claims held by DDGM are under such a discovery premium regime.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC407547178">
</A>
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC408152813">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage24"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Ejido Lands and Surface Right Acquisitions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	in Mexico
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Surface lands within our Oaxaca Mining Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejido
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lands (agrarian cooperative lands granted by the federal government to groups of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Campesinos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pursuant to Article 27 of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mexican Constitution of 1917). Prior to January
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1, 1994,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejidos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	could not transfer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejido
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lands into private ownership.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Amendments to Article 27 of the Mexican Constitution in 1994 now allow individual property ownership within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejidos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and allow
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejidos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to enter into commercial ventures with individuals or entities, including fore
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ign corporations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have an agreement with the local
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	San Pedro Totolapam Ejido
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	allowing exploration and exploitation of mineralization at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project and some of our surrounding properties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mexican law recognizes mining as a land use generally su
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	perior to agriculture.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	However, the law also recognizes the rights of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejidos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to compensation in the event mining activity interrupts or discontinues their
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	use of the agricultural lands.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Compensation is typically made in the form of a cash payment to the hol
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	der of the agricultural rights.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The amount of such compensation is generally related to the perceived value of the agricultural rights as negotiated in the first instance between the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Ejidos
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	he owner of the mineral rights.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	If the parties are unable to reach agreement on the amount of the compensation, the decision will be referred to the government.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have established surface rights agreements with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	San Pedro Totolapam Ejido
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and the individuals impacted by our proposed operations which allow disturbance of the surface where necessary for our exploration activities and mining operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage25"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Nevada Mining Unit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Exploration Properties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/09/0001558370-16-003907_GORO20151231X10K002.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 4.510417IN; HEIGHT: 6.260417IN" ALT="PICTURE 4">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Radar Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In September 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	we leased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Radar property from Altan Nevada Minerals Limited for ten years. The Radar property covers an area of approximately 3,550 acres and is made up of 178 unpatented lode claims located in the area known as the Walker Lane Mineral Belt in central Nevada. Radar is immediately adjacent to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	past-producing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	gold-silver-mercury Paradise Peak Mine, near the Round Mountain and Rawhide mines. Pursuant to the lease, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	required to make work expenditures of up to $250,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	annually
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to maintain our interest in the property and at our option we may purchase the property for $1.5 million, subject to a 3% net smelter return (&#x201C;NSR&#x201D;) royalty, at any time prior to the expiration of the lease term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage26"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2015, we conducted detailed and property-wide geologic mapping and geochemical sampling as well as completing an initial 6-hole program consisting of 1,985 meters of core drilling at Radar. These holes targeted anomalous gold and mercury&#x2013;bearing structures along a more than two kilometer trend coinciding with numerous historic mercury mines and prospects. Results of the exploration efforts indicated potential of bulk-tonnage high-sulfidation style gold mineralization in the northern and eastern portions of the property area where mineralized targets are hosted in favorable volcanic tuff units
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Further exploration drilling is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	being evaluated on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the mineralized potential on the Radar property in 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27.35PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Goose Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In December
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014, we leased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Goose property from Nevada Eagle LLC for five years. The Goose property consists of five unpatented lode claims covering approximately 100 acres adjacent to Radar in the Walker Lane Mineral Belt. The claims comprising the Goose property cover &#x201C;Newman Ridge,&#x201D; a mountain located directly west of the past producing Paradise Peak mine, near the Round Mountain and Rawhide mines.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have an option to purchase the property for $175,000, subject to a 2%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	NSR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	royalty, at any time prior to the expiration of the lease term. The Goose Property is located within the area of interest for the Radar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Property which is being leased from Altan Nevada Minerals Limited and is subject to an additional 3% smelter return royalty.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The same bulk-tonnage high-sulfidation style gold mineralization hosted in favorable volcanic tuff units extends onto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Goose property from Radar. Field investigations to identify drill targets were conducted on the Goose property in 2015. Further investigations and exploration drilling are being evaluated for Goose in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Gold Mesa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	November 2015, we acquired an option to purchase a gold bearing property in Nevada, held by Silver Reserve Corporation (&#x201C;SRC&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a wholly-owned subsidiary of Infrastructure Materials Corp., which we refer to as &#x201C;Gold Mesa.&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The option gives the Company the exclusive right to purchase the prop
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	erty at any time over a term of 36 months.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The option is exercisable for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$270,000 cash and restricted common stock valued at $1,000,000 at closing.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	There are no work commitments associated with this option.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gold Mesa consists of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximately 1,780 acres
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	89 unpatented claims and 3 patented claims in central Nevada&#x2019;s Walker Lane Mineral Belt. The property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	is located 17 miles south-south
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	st of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Radar and Goose properties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	portion of the property&#x2019;s claims were mined historically on a very small scale as an underground mine in the early 1900&#x2019;s and as a small open pit mine in the late 1980&#x2019;s.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Existing infrastructure includes nearby electricity, road access and potential water from a historic well located on the property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gold Mesa includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the gold property historically known as the Clay Peters Project. After acquiring our option, we staked an additional 140 unpatented claims totaling approximately 2,800 acres which surrounds the original
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Gold Mesa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	property.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The property is subject t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	o a NSR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in favor of SRC on future production consisting of a 2% NSR on all cla
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ims with no existing royalties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and a 1% NSR on the three patented claims. There is an existing 2% NSR on the three patented claims payable to an unrelated third party.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional rights to purchase back one half of each of the 2% NSR and 1% NSR from SRC subject to certain terms and restrictions and a first right of refusal to purchase the entire NSR upon a proposed disposition by SRC.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Field investigations to identify drill targets and initial exploration drilling are planned for Gold Mesa in 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are currently in the process of obtaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	necessary exploration permits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC407547179">
</A>
<A NAME="GORO-20151231X10K_HTM__TOC408152814">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Office Facilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We constructed an administrative office building adjacent to the mill site as part of the facilities at the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Aguila
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Project.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We also lease office space in Oaxaca City, Oaxaca consisting of approximately 3,000 square feet.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The lease commenced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in 2012
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for ten years. In 2014, we sold the building that serves as our executive and administr
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ative headquarters in Colorado Springs and have leased a portion back und
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	er a renewable one-year lease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We also lease an office in Denver, Colorado consisting of approximately 2,500 square feet, which we renewed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015 for three years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	26
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage27"></A>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#GORO-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>

</DIV>
